Module com.graphql_java_generator.graphql_maven_plugin_project.graphql_maven_plugin_samples_allGraphQLCases_server

Package org.allGraphQLCases.server.impl.relayConnection

package org.allGraphQLCases.server.impl.relayConnection
This package contains all the Data Fetcher that are specific to the relay connection capability.
They are necessary only if the addRelayConnections plugin parameter is set to true.
Author:
etienne-sf
